text: Intertel is the second oldest and third largest high IQ society. Members must score in the top one percentile on a standardized, supervised IQ test. Intertel was founded in 1966. The name was originally "The International Legion of Intelligence" and members are called ILIans. Today it has more than 1700 members from over forty countries. == Related pages == * Mensa International * Triple Nine Society == Other websites == * == References == Category:Intelligence
title: Intertel
